metadata.name: chador
metadata.description: It is customary for Iranian religious women to wear a chador, and holding their fingers under the chador requires special skills. They hold their fingers in such a way that part of the chin is covered and in some cases part of the eyes is also covered.In Iranian cities, women's clothing is different and often full of color. But the chador is the general covering of religious women, which is black.Which, along with the covers of other cities in Iran, has created an interesting beauty
